name: SlimeTROID
description:
Take control of a shape-shifting slime creature and try to escape the laboratory!

Created for My First Game Jam - Summer 2020

Hints:

  • The slime form can jump off walls
  • Use the Heavy form to break Shields

Attribution:

Free sound effects from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com

Video Dungeon Crawl by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4584-video-dungeon-crawl
